title: President
description: They provide overall leadership and direction to the organization, preside over meetings, and serve as the primary spokesperson.

title: Executive Vice President
description: They assist the President in their duties and assume leadership responsibilities in their absence.

title: Vice President
description: They support the President and Executive team in various capacities, often overseeing specific areas of operation or initiatives.

title: Associate Vice President
description: They assist the Vice President or Executive team with specific tasks or projects as needed.

title: Executive
description: They hold a leadership position within the organization's executive team, often with specific responsibilities or portfolios.

title: Director
description: They manage a specific department or aspect of the organization's operations, such as programming, marketing, or finance.

title: Secretary
description: They handle administrative tasks, including meeting minutes, correspondence, and record-keeping.

title: Chief Operating Officer
description: They oversee the day-to-day operations of the organization, ensuring efficiency and effectiveness in achieving goals and objectives.
